NAME: Divine Heal
DESCRIPTION: Perform a moderate heal on yourself. Remove all your debuffs.

NAME: Glorious Shield
DESCRIPTION: Spend 30% of your mana to create a shield for 30% of your max health. Increases your physical and magical defense.

NAME: Read Prayer
DESCRIPTION: Recover a moderate amount of MP. Increases your magical attack.

NAME: God's Wrath
DESCRIPTION: Deal high physical dark damage to an enemy

NAME: Lord's Intervention
DESCRIPTION: Remove all enemy buffs. Does not skip your turn.
